name: A Rythm Game
description:
Welcome to A Rythm Game!

This game is inspired of old popular rythm games.

Currently having 13 levels you can play!

With 2 different style of mode such as Piano mode or Heart mode.

More levels will be added aswell as seasons that unlocks secret minigames related to other games of mine (mainly P:Y)

Have fun!

---------------------------------------------------

CREDITS :

Music by multiple authors - lofi music style

Coding - Me

Graphics - Mostly me except icons

Sound effects : Freesound.org

Beta testing - My 2 little brothers

---------------------------------------------------
